item.title: Events and workshops
item.description: The LRisk agenda lists all forthcoming events and workshops organized by (among others) my research lab. Here is a selection of recent events and workshops: 4th European Actuarial Journal Conference. International conference hosted in Leuven from September 9-11, 2018.
